halation:BottledLove.NAME: Bottled Love
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, choose a card. Upon taking damage, that card's damage is increased by 1 for the combat.
Choose a card for
will increase in damage by 1 upon taking damage.
halation:BottledLove.FLAVOR: The world outside is filled with impurities. People I hate. People in my way. Liars. Dirty people. I need to exterminate all risks.

halation:PurpleSoulGem.NAME: Purple Soul Gem
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Restart the battle and all enemies gain #b2 Strength.
halation:PurpleSoulGem.FLAVOR: If…If it’s for your sake…I don’t mind being locked in this eternal maze.

halation:BlueSoulGem.NAME: Blue Soul Gem
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Take no damage this combat and reduce your Max Health to #r10%. Cannot be used in boss combats. Can only be used twice.
halation:BlueSoulGem.FLAVOR: I didn’t want this power so I could fight witches. I wanted it so I’d have the strength to do what’s right and protect the ones I love.

halation:RedSoulGem.NAME: Red Soul Gem
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Gain #b10 Strength. You may no longer use Skills this combat. Can only be used on turn one
halation:RedSoulGem.FLAVOR: If you live for yourself you’ve only got yourself to blame. So I can’t really blame anyone else and I don’t have any regrets.

halation:YellowSoulGem.NAME: Yellow Soul Gem
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Deal #b15 damage to ALL enemies. Apply #b99 Vulnerable to yourself. Can only be used once per combat and only up to #b8 times overall.
halation:YellowSoulGem.FLAVOR: If you’re not 100% sure why you’re doing it, you’ll most certainly regret it later.

halation:PinkSoulGem.NAME: Pink Soul Gem
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Deal damage equal to the charges on this relic and lose all charges. Gain charges equal to twice the damage you take.
halation:PinkSoulGem.FLAVOR: If anyone ever tells me it’s a mistake to have hope, well then, I’ll just tell them they’re wrong. And I’ll keep telling them till they believe.

halation:Convergence.NAME: Convergence
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Reset your health, deck, gold, and relics to as they were at the start of the act. Generate a new version of the current act and start from the beginning. Lose #b20 Max Health.
halation:Convergence.FLAVOR: I will never lose, not to you, nor to fate! That is my choice.

halation:Yufonium.NAME: Yufonium
DESCRIPTIONS: Every attack you draw has its cost lowered by #b1. Deal #rhalf damage with attacks. You can only play up to #b20 cards a turn.
halation:Yufonium.FLAVOR: Don't give up. Not until you've done everything in your power!

halation:Trompette.NAME: Trompette
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play only attacks in a combat, heal 10 HP.
halation:Trompette.FLAVOR: You really do have an awful personality.

halation:StarCompass.NAME: Star Compass
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]activate.[] Holds the deepest secrets of the Spire. Perhaps if you are worthy...?
halation:StarCompass.FLAVOR: A compass that always seems to point up no matter your orientation. Maybe it holds a dark secret.

halation:EternalFortune.NAME: Eternal Fortune
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pickup, raise your Max HP by 3. Occasionally run into more #yEternal #yFortune.
halation:EternalFortune.FLAVOR: A favorite among Spire Dwellers. They grow everywhere and are said to bless any ascender with good luck.

halation:WeightlessCrab.NAME: Weightless Crab
DESCRIPTIONS: For every #b3 Curses you draw, gain #b1 Intangible.
halation:WeightlessCrab.FLAVOR: I am not a friend of justice. I am an enemy of evil.

halation:TwoAmDonut.NAME: 2 AM Donut
DESCRIPTIONS: If you do not play any attacks, at the end of your turn gain #b2 Strength.

halation:IncompleteEncyclopedia.NAME: Incomplete Encyclopedia
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E] at the start of your turn. You can no longer see enemy health.
halation:IncompleteEncyclopedia.FLAVOR: I don't know everything. I only know what I know.

halation:HeavySnake.NAME: Heavy Snake
DESCRIPTIONS: Add #b3 random Curses to the bottom of your draw pile at the start of combat. Every time you smith a card, upgrade #b3 more random cards.
halation:HeavySnake.FLAVOR: I only want one thing. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything. Everything.

halation:MonkeysPaw.NAME: Monkey's Paw
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you play a card, add #b2 copies of it to the bottom of your draw pile at #rhalf power (rounded down)
halation:MonkeysPaw.FLAVOR: Upon closer inspection, this isn't a monkey's paw at all.

halation:LostSnail.NAME: No Longer Lost Snail
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon entering a #y? room, there is a #b40% all connected rooms become a #y? room.
halation:LostSnail.FLAVOR: I'm sure there's a reason that, even after I stopped being lost, I stayed here. I won't leave until I know what that reason is.

halation:NonexistentMirror.NAME: Nonexistent Mirror
DESCRIPTIONS: The next #b2 times you obtain a card, obtain a copy of it.
halation:NonexistentMirror.FLAVOR: "I saw a strange man outside of Kanbaru's house today." NL "When did they hang up a mirror?"

halation:PeacePiece.NAME: Peace Piece
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b3 turns, at the start of your turn, you and all enemies take no damage until the next turn.
halation:PeacePiece.FLAVOR: "Peace Peace" I said with a posed look.

halation:PlatinumPhoenix.NAME: Platinum Phoenix
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain [E] [E]. You can #ronly play #b1 cost cards.

halation:TrafficLight.NAME: Traffic Light
DESCRIPTIONS: [#2aecd7]Right [#2aecd7]click [#2aecd7]during [#2aecd7]combat [#2aecd7]to [#2aecd7]change [#2aecd7]mode.[] #gGreen #gMode: Gain #b2 Strength until the end of the turn for every card you play and #b1 Frail for every card you play. #rRed #rMode: Gain #b2 Dexterity until the end of the turn for every card you play and #y1 Weak for every card you play.
Currently in #gGreen #gMode
Currently in #rRed #rMode.
halation:TrafficLight.FLAVOR: When the world is filled with red lights, signalling danger, the world is safer than usual. But when it's filled with green lights signalling safety, it creates a place more dangerous than any other.

halation:SelfBoilingWater.NAME: Self Boiling Water
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b1 Strength at the start of combat for every charge on this relic. Gain a charge whenever you obtain a card, up to 3. Lose #rall charges whenever you skip or remove a card.
halation:SelfBoilingWater.FLAVOR: I despise water that thinks that it boiled itself on its own. I despise seasons that think they cycle naturally. I despise the sun that thinks it rose on its own. Despise, despise, d-d-despise...I despise them. I despise you.

halation:RainbowClouds.NAME: Rainbow Clouds
DESCRIPTIONS: In Elite combats, you can no longer draw on your first turn, instead, add cards from your deck to your hand equal to the amount of cards you would have drawn.
halation:RainbowClouds.FLAVOR: I know everything. There is nothing I don't know.

halation:Toothbrush.NAME: Toothbrush
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b3 Max HP whenever you remove a card from your deck.
halation:Toothbrush.FLAVOR: Get your head out of the gutter.

halation:PapillonHeart.NAME: Papillon Heart
DESCRIPTIONS: Every #b4 turns, at the start of your turn, your entire hand is played at no cost and exhausts. They are played in a random order and target random enemies.
halation:PapillonHeart.FLAVOR: It is precisely because I cannot die, that I can say, I will always be by your side.

halation:PinkAlligatorPlush.NAME: Pink Alligator Plush
DESCRIPTIONS: Lose #b2 HP at the start of every turn. If you die, heal to full and #rkill all enemies. Can only be used #ronce and stops doing damage once used.
halation:PinkAlligatorPlush.FLAVOR: Everyone is waiting to die if you think about it...Some just have longer to wait than others.

halation:Diary.NAME: Diary
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon pick up, and at the start of every act, pick the boss of the act.

halation:PenguinHat.NAME: Penguin Hat
DESCRIPTIONS: When you would die, revive to 10% HP as a new character. Can only be used #ronce.
halation:PenguinHat.FLAVOR: Listen up you low life scum who will accomplish nothing...!

halation:Komachan.NAME: Komachan
DESCRIPTIONS: The next room you can go to becomes a Rest Site.
halation:Komachan.FLAVOR: Koma-chan always said to be prepared!

halation:Sosunser.NAME: Sonsunser
DESCRIPTIONS: If you play #b8 attacks in one turn, play all #b8 attacks again.

halation:Gekota.NAME: Gekota
DESCRIPTIONS: Evoke an orb.

halation:SwordOfLegend.NAME: Sword of Legend
DESCRIPTIONS: Upon entering a Rest Site, heal #b3 HP for every monster room you entered since you picked this up or the last Rest Site you entered.

halation:VictoryRuler.NAME: Victory Ruler
DESCRIPTIONS: Knock back an enemy into the one behind it, dealing #b5 damage to both. If there is no enemy behind it, deal #b2 damage.
